The four fears [an4.121:6.7]: The fear of rebirth in a bad place
The punishments [an4.121:6.7]: Cutting off hands or feet, or both
Cutting off ears or nose, or both

The ‘porridge pot’, the ‘shell-shave’, the ‘demon’s mouth’, the ‘garland of fire’, the ‘burning hand’, the ‘grass blades’, the ‘bark dress’, the ‘antelope’, the ‘meat hook’, the ‘coins’, the ‘caustic pickle’, the ‘twisting bar’, the ‘straw mat’
Being splashed with hot oil, being fed to the dogs, being impaled alive, and being beheaded.
